title: Forgotten
short_cast: Kim Moo-yeol, Kang Ha-neul, Na Young-hee, Moon Sung-keun, Nam Myung-ryul, Lee Eun-woo, Jung Chan-bi, Go Choi, Bae Seong-il, Lee Soon-won

desc: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.
